workzen.xgen.util
Class SqlUtil

java.lang.Object
  workzen.xgen.util.SqlUtil

public class SqlUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Sql utility methods for reading and writing Blobs, Clobs, BLOBS, and CLOBS Catch IOExceptions for convience, and throw SQLExceptions.

Author:
Brad Matlack
